Subject: Access to the netwrix portal
Description: I do not see the option to choose netwrix customer portal. The reason why I choose PingCastle is because I have a license. :) Anyway, hope you can help or direct me in the right direction. Here is the question and below is a link to customer portal support article. 1. Is it possible to manage other users access to the license registered under my profile? 2. How do we associated the license to another profile in the customer portal? It would be nice if we could manage this ourselves. Link: https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/NetwrixCustomerPortalAccess/page/Customer_Portal_Access.html
Solution_Comment__c: Customer portal access updated according to customer's requirements
